title: Centralized Approach to Enhancing Persistence in Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Designing learner-customized microlearning content and establishing sustainable online learning strategies in a BYOD environment are key

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more mobile microlearning modules for social studies using centralized design templates within two weeks.
Learners can submit two or more learning design improvement plans based on peer feedback using collaboration tools.
Learners can demonstrate sustained online learning design competency by achieving 80% or higher in the summative assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
